original: @69b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @69b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajravidāraṇa.

analyzed: sngon gyi lan chags kyi dbang gis tshe 'di la phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba rnams ni /
translated: Those who, due to the power of past karmic debts, are bereft of excellence in this life,

analyzed: gtor ma'i las byed par 'dod pas rin po che'i snod rgya che la gting zab pa dag cing dri ma med pa chag pa dang gas pa dang / zhom pa la sogs pa med pa /
translated: if they wish to perform the rite of torma, they should fill a large, deep, pure, stainless, unbroken, uncracked, and unchipped precious vessel🔽with very clean rice or

original: 'bras chan nam /
analyzed: 'bras chan nam /
translated: flour,

translated: sprinkle it with very clean, stainless water,

original: sngon du stong pa nyid bsgom /
analyzed: sngon du stong pa nyid bsgom /
translated: and meditate on emptiness beforehand.

original: de nas tshad med bzhi bsgom /
analyzed: de nas tshad med bzhi bsgom /
translated: Then meditate on the four immeasurables.

original: de'i ngang las bdag nyid kyis pam zhes brjod pas bdag gi mdun du sdong po shin tu rgya che ba dpangs mtho ba sum brtsegs gcig la /
analyzed: de'i ngang las bdag nyid kyis pam zhes brjod pas bdag gi mdun du sdong po shin tu rgya che ba dpangs mtho ba sum brtsegs gcig la /
translated: From within that state, by oneself uttering “paṃ,” in front of oneself there is a single three-layered tree trunk, very vast and high.

original: de yang steng gi padma la kha dog dkar po 'dab ma dpag tu med pa dbus dmar po 'dab ma dpag tu med pa 'od sngon po dpag tu med pa dmigs so //
analyzed: de yang steng gi padma la kha dog dkar po 'dab ma dpag tu med pa dbus dmar po 'dab ma dpag tu med pa 'od sngon po dpag tu med pa dmigs so //
translated: Furthermore, visualize the upper lotus as white in color with infinite petals, the center as red with infinite petals, and infinite blue light.

original: de'i rjes la pam ka ma la h'um dza: zhes brjed pas /
analyzed: de'i rjes la pam ka ma la h'um dza: zhes brjed pas /
translated: After that, by reciting “paṃ kamalā hūṃ jaḥ,”

original: khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad spyan drangs /
analyzed: khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad spyan drangs /
translated: all sentient beings belonging to the three realms are invited.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can thams cad steng gi padma'i steng du 'dus shing 'khod par bsam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can thams cad steng gi padma'i steng du 'dus shing 'khod par bsam /
translated: Imagine that all sentient beings of the formless realm gather and sit on the upper lotus.

original: dbus su gzugs khams 'og tu 'dod pa khams kyi sems can 'dus shing 'khod par dmigs la /
analyzed: dbus su gzugs khams 'og tu 'dod pa khams kyi sems can 'dus shing 'khod par dmigs la /
translated: In the center, imagine that all sentient beings of the form realm gather and sit below.

original: de nas de'i 'og tu gtor ma'i snod de ci yin kyang rin po che'i snod rgya khyon dpag tu med par dmigs so //🔽de'i 'og tu h'um las rdo rje phyed phyung gi sgyed po /
analyzed: de nas de'i 'og tu gtor ma'i snod de ci yin kyang rin po che'i snod rgya khyon dpag tu med par dmigs so // de'i 'og tu h'um las rdo rje phyed phyung gi sgyed po /
translated: After that, below that, no matter what the torma vessel is, visualize it as a precious vessel with infinite width and depth.🔽Below that, the half-vajra arises from hūṃ.

original: de'i 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam gcig bskyed /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam gcig bskyed /
translated: Below that, a single crescent-shaped air maṇḍala arises from yaṃ.

original: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa /
analyzed: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa /
translated: On top of that, from raṃ, there is a triangular fire maṇḍala.🔽On top of that, on the hearth, from bhrūṃ, there is a jeweled vessel with a rim.

original: de'i steng du sgyed po'i steng du bhr'um las rin po che'i snod khor khor yug tu bcas pa dmigs shing de'i nang du kham las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho /
analyzed: de'i steng du sgyed po'i steng du bhr'um las rin po che'i snod khor khor yug tu bcas pa dmigs shing de'i nang du kham las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho /
translated: In the center of that, from khaṃ, there is an ocean of elixir.

original: de nas bdag nyid kyis yam yam yam zhes brjod pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las rlung g-yos /
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid kyis yam yam yam zhes brjod pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las rlung g-yos /
translated: Then, by reciting yaṃ yaṃ yaṃ, the wind maṇḍala moves from the wind maṇḍala.

original: ram ram ram zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: ram ram ram zhes brjod pas /
translated: Recite raṃ raṃ raṃ.

original: rlung g-yos pas me'i dkyil 'khor las me sbar /
analyzed: rlung g-yos pas me'i dkyil 'khor las me sbar /
translated: Since the wind moves, the fire maṇḍala blazes.🔽Recite bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhrūṃ.

original: bhr'um bhr'um bhr'um zhes brjod pas 'og tu me 'bar bas snod rin po che'i snod du zhu /
analyzed: bhr'um bhr'um bhr'um zhes brjod pas 'og tu me 'bar bas snod rin po che'i snod du zhu /
translated: Since the fire blazes below, the vessel melts into a precious vessel.🔽Recite khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ.

original: kham kham kham zhes brjod pas me 'bar bas snod dros pas rdzas rnams zhu bas /
analyzed: kham kham kham zhes brjod pas me 'bar bas snod dros pas rdzas rnams zhu bas /
translated: Since the vessel is heated by the fire, the substances melt.

original: bdud rtsi'i @70a * //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i @70a * //
translated: The elixir

original: rgya mtshor 'khyil /
analyzed: rgya mtshor 'khyil /
translated: swirls in the ocean.

original: de nas aom zhes brjod pas snod kyi nang dam tshig gi bdud rtsi de sku'i bdud rtsir gyur /
analyzed: de nas aom zhes brjod pas snod kyi nang dam tshig gi bdud rtsi de sku'i bdud rtsir gyur /
translated: Then, by reciting oṃ, the pledge elixir in the vessel becomes the elixir of awakened body.

original: a'a: zhes brjod pas gsung gi bdud rtsir gyur /
analyzed: a'a: zhes brjod pas gsung gi bdud rtsir gyur /
translated: Recite āḥ.

original: h'um zhes brjod pas thugs kyi bdud rtsir gyur /
analyzed: h'um zhes brjod pas thugs kyi bdud rtsir gyur /
translated: By reciting “hum,” it becomes the elixir of enlightened mind.

original: de nas yang ram zhes brjod pas dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i nyes pa rnams bsregs /
analyzed: de nas yang ram zhes brjod pas dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i nyes pa rnams bsregs /
translated: Then, by reciting “ram,” the faults of the elixir of sacred pledge are burned.

original: yam gis gtor /
analyzed: yam gis gtor /
translated: By “yam,” it is scattered.

original: kham gis bkrus nas de nas sku gsung thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i bdud rtsir gyur ba'o //
analyzed: kham gis bkrus nas de nas sku gsung thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i bdud rtsir gyur ba'o //
translated: By “kham,” it is washed, and then it becomes the elixir of inseparable enlightened body, speech, and mind.

original: de nas srung ba chen po'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad /
analyzed: de nas srung ba chen po'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad /
translated: Then, by the mantra of great protection, the obstructors are expelled.

original: de nas badzra zhes brjod pas zla phyed rdo rje las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi babs te /
analyzed: de nas badzra zhes brjod pas zla phyed rdo rje las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi babs te /
translated: Then, by reciting “vajra,” the elixir of timeless awareness descends from the half-moon and vajra.

original: rnam par dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen po'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen po'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur te /
translated: It becomes a great ocean of the great pure elixir.

original: de nas aom ba lim bhu dza bhaksha bhaksha ai dam kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
analyzed: de nas aom ba lim bhu dza bhaksha bhaksha ai dam kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
translated: Then, recite “om balim bhuk jaksha bhakṣa idam kha kha khāhi khāhi.

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'an'am a'adya nutpanna /
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'an'am a'adya nutpanna /
translated: Om akaro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām adyanutpannatvādaḥ.🔽Tvaṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.”

original: tv'ad aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pas gzugs med pa rnams la yid bzhin nor bus dbul /
analyzed: tv'ad aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pas gzugs med pa rnams la yid bzhin nor bus dbul /
translated: The formless beings are offered the wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: gzugs khams rnams la dpag bsam gyi shing 'dod pa rnams la rang rang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du thob par mos par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs khams rnams la dpag bsam gyi shing 'dod pa rnams la rang rang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du thob par mos par bya'o //
translated: Imagine that the beings of the form realm receive the wish-fulfilling tree, which grants whatever they desire, just as they imagine it.

original: de nas tshigs bcad kyang 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: de nas tshigs bcad kyang 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: Then recite this verse:

original: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i gtor ma 'dis //
analyzed: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i gtor ma 'dis //
translated: With this torma, naturally pure,

original: dkon mchog mchod gnas bla ma'i zhing gyur dang // gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pas bsdus pa yi //
analyzed: dkon mchog mchod gnas bla ma'i zhing gyur dang // gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pas bsdus pa yi //
translated: I make offerings to the Three Jewels, the guru, the field of merit, the formless gods, the gods of form, and the gods of desire.

original: mgon btsun grogs byed chos skyong srung ma dang // rang bzhin yon tan ldan pa'i rigs rnams dang // lan chags 'dod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang // gnod byed 'phral gyi rkyen du byed la bsngo //
analyzed: mgon btsun grogs byed chos skyong srung ma dang // rang bzhin yon tan ldan pa'i rigs rnams dang // lan chags 'dod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang // gnod byed 'phral gyi rkyen du byed la bsngo //
translated: I dedicate to the protectors, the venerable ones, the friends, the dharmapālas, the guards, those with a natural affinity, those with a desire for karmic connection, and those who create immediate adverse conditions.

original: lan chags dang bral bar byed pa gtor ma'i las dpag bsam gyi sdong po zhes bya ba /
analyzed: lan chags dang bral bar byed pa gtor ma'i las dpag bsam gyi sdong po zhes bya ba /
translated: The Torma Ritual for Becoming Free of Karmic Debts, the Wish-Fulfilling Tree,

original: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: composed by the master Yeshé Dorjé, is complete.
